oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Mawārid al-ʻadhbah al-ṣāfiyah fī sharḥ al-Kāfiyah al-wāfiyah : manuscript, [ca. 1706]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Baʻlī, ʻAbd al-Jalīl ibn Abī al-Mawāhib ibn Abd al-Bāqī , 1669-1707
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column with poems in two columns, 29 lines per pages, in black and red.

Ownership statement on f. 1r signed ʻAlī ibn al-Yadghar Shāh and dated 1118 AH [1706 or 07 AD]. Two other ownerships statements dated 1120 AH [1708 or 09 AD] and 1125 AH [1712 or 13 AD] are illegible.
MS Arab 162. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
